programme.title: The Bone Collector
Sakupljač kostiju
programme.desc:
The Bone Collector: Directed by Phillip Noyce. With Denzel Washington, Angelina Jolie, Queen Latifah, Michael Rooker. A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0145681/","name":"The Bone Collector","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWQxN2ZmNDMtMzA2Ny00ZDJhLTlkNTgtMWMyZjljY2QzMzNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0145681/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"denise_kate"},"dateCreated":"2005-03-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well worth a look! Both Jolie and Washington are on form","reviewBody":"I've read quite a few comments on this movie and some of them I disagree with and others I don't. Sure, it may be a little predictable and a bit 'all been done before' but there is a certain level of originality and uniqueness to it also.

For starters it has a fantastic cast and both lead actors (Jolie and Washington)have won Oscars and thats says something. It can't be easy playing a paralysed man and remaining so still and wooden and he plays the frustrations and emotions so realistically that I would imagine a person actually would be like in real life. Jolie is charming, composed and works well with the camera. Her character is convincing enough and this goes for her performance.The support cast is fantastic too, especially Queen Latifa.

The film may have the usual iconographic elements found in the psychological thriller genre but they are necessary for it to firstly conform and also progress. 'The Bone Collector' introduces new techniques and a slightly different angle for the viewer. there has to be a certain amount of repetition with this genre for it to work and this is the case for many others, such as romantic comedies and a couple falling in love or teen flicks with a football jock character.

I am currently writing my degree dissertation on sexual subjectivity in psychological thrillers and this film is perfect for that. The changing levels of gendered representations is very interesting and both supports and detracts away from the current representations in society.

I say, give it a go! Don't listen to people who have already seen it and didn't like it. If I'd have done that then I wouldn't have given it a go and my dissertation would have been short of argument!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":161990,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-02-09","keywords":"criminal investigation,quadriplegic,new york city,copycat crime,paralysis","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Bone Collector","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2626617625","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGUwMGMyOTUtMzZhOS00MmRiLWFkNWMtNjZmNTFhNzMyMTdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGUwMGMyOTUtMzZhOS00MmRiLWFkNWMtNjZmNTFhNzMyMTdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001451/","name":"Queen Latifah"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0637518/","name":"Phillip Noyce"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0213281/","name":"Jeffery Deaver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0406228/","name":"Jeremy Iacone"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0145681, Title: The Bone Collector, --- Description: The Bone Collector: Directed by Phillip Noyce. With Denzel Washington, Angelina Jolie, Queen Latifah, Michael Rooker. A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0145681/","name":"The Bone Collector","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWQxN2ZmNDMtMzA2Ny00ZDJhLTlkNTgtMWMyZjljY2QzMzNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0145681/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"denise_kate","dateCreated":"2005-03-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well worth a look! Both Jolie and Washington are on form","reviewBody":"I've read quite a few comments on this movie and some of them I disagree with and others I don't. Sure, it may be a little predictable and a bit 'all been done before' but there is a certain level of originality and uniqueness to it also.

For starters it has a fantastic cast and both lead actors (Jolie and Washington)have won Oscars and thats says something. It can't be easy playing a paralysed man and remaining so still and wooden and he plays the frustrations and emotions so realistically that I would imagine a person actually would be like in real life. Jolie is charming, composed and works well with the camera. Her character is convincing enough and this goes for her performance.The support cast is fantastic too, especially Queen Latifa.

The film may have the usual iconographic elements found in the psychological thriller genre but they are necessary for it to firstly conform and also progress. 'The Bone Collector' introduces new techniques and a slightly different angle for the viewer. there has to be a certain amount of repetition with this genre for it to work and this is the case for many others, such as romantic comedies and a couple falling in love or teen flicks with a football jock character.

I am currently writing my degree dissertation on sexual subjectivity in psychological thrillers and this film is perfect for that. The changing levels of gendered representations is very interesting and both supports and detracts away from the current representations in society.

I say, give it a go! Don't listen to people who have already seen it and didn't like it. If I'd have done that then I wouldn't have given it a go and my dissertation would have been short of argument!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":161990,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-02-09","keywords":"criminal investigation,quadriplegic,new york city,copycat crime,paralysis","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Bone Collector","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2626617625","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGUwMGMyOTUtMzZhOS00MmRiLWFkNWMtNjZmNTFhNzMyMTdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGUwMGMyOTUtMzZhOS00MmRiLWFkNWMtNjZmNTFhNzMyMTdkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001451/","name":"Queen Latifah"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0637518/","name":"Phillip Noyce"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0213281/","name":"Jeffery Deaver","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0406228/","name":"Jeremy Iacone"],"duration":"PT1H58M"</script><metacontent="

An aging thief hopes to retire and live off his ill-gotten wealth when a young kid convinces him into doing one last heist." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0227445/","name":"The Score","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDNjYmY1ZDEtM2I3YS00MDhmLTk5NDYtYzU5MTA4ZjIyYzJiL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"An aging thief hopes to retire and live off his ill-gotten wealth when a young kid convinces him into doing one last heist.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0227445/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"apowersdmb"},"dateCreated":"2001-07-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Three of the best actors from their generation shine.","reviewBody":"The Score seems to start off slow for some, but the film's speed is important for the movie. It shows how DeNiro's character lives his life and his life is essential to the plot. "One more" is what he has been saying for years, but this time he means it and will do whatever it takes to make sure nothing goes wrong. Edward Norton's character gives Bob the most grief because he isn't sure if Norton will fly straight. Norton's performance is doubly magnificent and anyone who hasn't seen this actor in action is missing out big time. Brando delivers about 5 scenes that are right on key and provides some comic relief that fits nicely. Overall a really good film that will leave audiences with their jaws on the floor."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":125165,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-12-26","keywords":"coffeeshop,confidence artist,hanging from the ceiling,infrared,cell phone","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000134/","name":"Robert De Niro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001570/","name":"Edward Norton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000008/","name":"Marlon Brando"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000568/","name":"Frank Oz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013922/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0852196/","name":"Daniel E. programme.title: Cars
Auti
programme.desc:
Cars: Directed by John Lasseter, Joe Ranft. With Owen Wilson, Paul Newman, Bonnie Hunt, Larry the Cable Guy. A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317219/","name":"Cars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NzY0MzA2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc3NTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317219/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"drqshadow-reviews"},"dateCreated":"2011-07-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Perfect for the Kid Who Loves Matchbox Racers - His Parents, Less So","reviewBody":"There's really nothing wrong with this; it fits the mold as a smart kid's movie with enough subtle nudges and winks to keep the adults happy, a formula that Pixar has mined extremely well over the past decade and a half. It's even got that one weighty central topic, the moment the entire picture balances upon, when the collective audience presumably takes a sharp breath of air and has some sort of mini-epiphany in connecting it to their own lives. The major pieces are all there, truly, so why didn't I find this picture as rewarding as the rest of the animation house's legendary catalog? It's got something to do with the moments in-between. Usually, it's precisely those instants off the beaten path that Pixar absolutely swallows up, enveloping the screen with tiny jokes, dazzling visual wizardry and deep, circumstantial character development. In Cars, for whatever reason, the power in such moments is lacking. The studio goes through the motions, which makes for a more-than-decent facsimile, but in the end it doesn't feel as complete and engaging as their other masterworks. I would've loved it as a kid, and plan to share it with mine some day, but as an adult I'd rather throw in Toy Story or The Incredibles.

Revised thoughts, nearly three years later:

My boys are absolutely bonkers for Lightning McQueen and Tow Mater right now, but had never actually seen the movie. Needless to say, they loved it, and I discovered that my own opinion has softened over time. Of course, it still can't hold a torch to the innocent humor of Toy Story, the sentimentality of Monsters, Inc. or the pulse-pounding twists of The Incredibles, but it fits in snugly on the second tier alongside A Bug's Life and Ratatouille. The theme may have seemed transparently concocted to sell merchandise, but as a product of the era when Pixar didn't do anything they didn't believe in, it still resonates with thoughtful care and well-placed emotion. Perhaps unfairly cast aside at first, it's a well-made, lovingly executed film that tugs shamelessly at the heart strings when its points bubble to the surface. I'd upgrade my score from 7 to 8/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":388919,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-09-06","keywords":"car,car movie,route 66,truck,tow truck","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"How the Best Racing Films Raise the Stakes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi365149977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On this IMDbrief, sponsored by Coca-Cola, we're putting the pedal to the metal on the best racing films of all time."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001372/","name":"Bonnie Hunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000056/","name":"Paul Newman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460146/","name":"Jorgen Klubien"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Starsky & Hutch
Starsky i Hutch
programme.desc:
Starsky & Hutch: Directed by Todd Phillips. With Ben Stiller, Owen Wilson, Snoop Dogg, Fred Williamson. Two streetwise cops bust criminals in their red and white Ford Gran Torino, with the help of a police snitch called "Huggy Bear"." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0335438/","name":"Starsky & Hutch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzU2NTQ1NTkxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTE1MTEzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two streetwise cops bust criminals in their red and white Ford Gran Torino, with the help of a police snitch called "Huggy Bear".","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0335438/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MovieAddict2016"},"dateCreated":"2004-07-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Funny (and entertaining!) send-up of the cop-buddy formula","reviewBody":"A funny and thoroughly enjoyable spin on the overused cop-buddy formula, "Starsky and Hutch" is one of the most entertaining films of 2004 -- even if it's nothing more than just that. 

With a fair share of laugh-out-loud moments, and more than a handful of in-joke references to '70s pop culture (including the original source material: "Starsky and Hutch" the TV show), it also boasts a fine comedic cast with talented performers: Ben Stiller, Owen Wilson, Vince Vaughn, Snoop Dogg, Chris Penn, Amy Smart and some uncredited cameos by the likes of Will Ferrell -- and yes, even the original Starsky and Hutch. But their shared appearance is one best left open. ("I get a good vibe from these guys," the younger Hutch exclaims in one of the film's most savory self-referential moments.)

The film takes place in Bay City, "sometime during the '70s," when David Starsky (Stiller) -- a by-the-numbers police officer who spends his entire day chasing small-time crooks -- is paired up with a new partner, the reckless Ken "Hutch" Hutchinson (Wilson). Starsky and Hutch don't get along at first -- their mixed personalities collide, resulting in uncomfortable tension. Placed on an assignment involving an alleged drug lord (Vaughn), who has managed to create undetectable cocaine, Starsky and Hutch find themselves in a number of awkward situations: getting a statement by Big Earl (Ferrell), a dragon-obsessed inmate with some major issues; the usual tidbits of information from Huggy Bear (Dogg), a friend and informant of Hutch's; and of course the mandatory romantic subplot involving a pair of sexy cheerleaders.

The contrast of Starsky and Hutch is handled deliberately blunt: this comedy isn't as much a victim of the cop-buddy genre as it is a dead-on spoof. Hutch is a self-described "realist" -- during his introductory sequence he is shown fleeing the scene of a robbery with a stash of money. We assume he is undercover, and that's what he tells the cops when they try to arrest him. However, he's just using his badge as an excuse to commit crimes -- and get away with them.

I asked myself if it was as possible as the film implies, but then the Constantly Yelling and/or Upset Police Captain (another clichéd role that happens to show up in all these movies) tells Hutch that it's the seventh time he's been arrested for robbery, and Hutch tells him that he's undercover -- trying to work his way in through the criminal underground. The joke, of course, is that we find out the robberies are all totally unrelated and bear no significant to a criminal underground of any kind.

There are a few sequences in the movie that deserve a description of their own, such as when Starsky accidentally consumes a large amount of cocaine and works himself into an ultimate-high-frenzy, battling on the disco floor of a nightclub for short-lived glory. After his opponent is unjustly awarded the gold medal, Starsky pulls out his gun and from there on the entire situation escalates into one of those scenes that -- like parts of Stiller's "There's Something About Mary" -- last on in viewers' minds even after the film itself fades away. The sort of sequence you might chuckle about to yourself as you drive home and recall certain moments from the film.

Stiller and Wilson -- presently two of Hollywood's most famous odd couples who have united together for a number of projects over the years -- are always likable in their films and nothing changes here. Wilson uses his sarcastic quips to an advantage, coming across as the smoother of the two, whereas Starsky is the bumbling and self-conscious idiot who is both over-protective and over-zealous.

The movie is at its best when it is cleverly satirizing the genre. Most of these films always include a sequence where the police captain will suspend the movie's protagonist and frown on him, saying something cheesy like, "Your father, who spent years on the force and was one of the highest-decorated officers, would be ashamed of you!" Instead, the police captain tells Starsky that his mother would be ashamed of him. And then after being suspended, Starsky takes a visit to his mother's grave and places a glazed donut on the headstone (she was the highly decorated cop in the family, apparently).

The film was directed by Todd Phillips, whose resume includes such raunchy efforts at comedy as the crude-but-enjoyable "Road Trip" and surprising "Old School." The latter film starred Ferrell and Vaughn and contained a cameo appearance by Snoop Dogg (as himself), so obviously these guys enjoyed working with Phillips and, I'm sure, agreed to contribute to this movie just for the heck of it.

The result is a very goofy, entertaining summer flick that never tries too hard and invariably never falls too hard, either. It does fall sometimes, but even then it usually takes its screw-ups with a pinch of salt. This is the sort of movie worth the price of admission -- just to sit back, forget your worries, and watch a couple of clowns bumble their way through an enjoyable farce of the '70s. It's not the kind of movie you'll be talking about after you see it -- just a simple popcorn flick. If you're out and about and you happen to stumble into a theater showing this film, you'll find your money well spent. I won't praise "Starsky and Hutch" for being a brilliant tongue-in-cheek spoof of the cop-buddy films -- I'll merely say that, for what it is, "Starsky and Hutch" is well-made and funny -- a surprisingly simple movie that is everything it pretends to be. The majority of films that use this approach suffer because they fall victim to their targets, especially most released this year, but where the others have failed "Starsky and Hutch" succeeds.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":143120,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2005-04-06","keywords":"character names as title,buddy movie,night club,1970s,russian roulette","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Starsky & Hutch","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi25887001","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Q2NjI1OTYtMDJiNy00MDY2LWE0Y2EtY2E5ZDI2NTZjODU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Q2NjI1OTYtMDJiNy00MDY2LWE0Y2EtY2E5ZDI2NTZjODU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Miramax"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001774/","name":"Ben Stiller"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004879/","name":"Snoop Dogg"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0680846/","name":"Todd Phillips"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0175068/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0088479/","name":"William Blinn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1192866/","name":"Stevie Long"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1016088/","name":"John O'Brien"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0335438, Title: Starsky & Hutch, --- Description: Starsky & Hutch: Directed by Todd Phillips. With Ben Stiller, Owen Wilson, Snoop Dogg, Fred Williamson. Two streetwise cops bust criminals in their red and white Ford Gran Torino, with the help of a police snitch called "Huggy Bear"." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0335438/","name":"Starsky & Hutch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzU2NTQ1NTkxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTE1MTEzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two streetwise cops bust criminals in their red and white Ford Gran Torino, with the help of a police snitch called "Huggy Bear".","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0335438/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"MovieAddict2016","dateCreated":"2004-07-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Funny (and entertaining!) send-up of the cop-buddy formula","reviewBody":"A funny and thoroughly enjoyable spin on the overused cop-buddy formula, "Starsky and Hutch" is one of the most entertaining films of 2004 -- even if it's nothing more than just that. 

With a fair share of laugh-out-loud moments, and more than a handful of in-joke references to '70s pop culture (including the original source material: "Starsky and Hutch" the TV show), it also boasts a fine comedic cast with talented performers: Ben Stiller, Owen Wilson, Vince Vaughn, Snoop Dogg, Chris Penn, Amy Smart and some uncredited cameos by the likes of Will Ferrell -- and yes, even the original Starsky and Hutch. But their shared appearance is one best left open. ("I get a good vibe from these guys," the younger Hutch exclaims in one of the film's most savory self-referential moments.)

The film takes place in Bay City, "sometime during the '70s," when David Starsky (Stiller) -- a by-the-numbers police officer who spends his entire day chasing small-time crooks -- is paired up with a new partner, the reckless Ken "Hutch" Hutchinson (Wilson). Starsky and Hutch don't get along at first -- their mixed personalities collide, resulting in uncomfortable tension. Placed on an assignment involving an alleged drug lord (Vaughn), who has managed to create undetectable cocaine, Starsky and Hutch find themselves in a number of awkward situations: getting a statement by Big Earl (Ferrell), a dragon-obsessed inmate with some major issues; the usual tidbits of information from Huggy Bear (Dogg), a friend and informant of Hutch's; and of course the mandatory romantic subplot involving a pair of sexy cheerleaders.

The contrast of Starsky and Hutch is handled deliberately blunt: this comedy isn't as much a victim of the cop-buddy genre as it is a dead-on spoof. Hutch is a self-described "realist" -- during his introductory sequence he is shown fleeing the scene of a robbery with a stash of money. We assume he is undercover, and that's what he tells the cops when they try to arrest him. However, he's just using his badge as an excuse to commit crimes -- and get away with them.

I asked myself if it was as possible as the film implies, but then the Constantly Yelling and/or Upset Police Captain (another clichéd role that happens to show up in all these movies) tells Hutch that it's the seventh time he's been arrested for robbery, and Hutch tells him that he's undercover -- trying to work his way in through the criminal underground. The joke, of course, is that we find out the robberies are all totally unrelated and bear no significant to a criminal underground of any kind.

There are a few sequences in the movie that deserve a description of their own, such as when Starsky accidentally consumes a large amount of cocaine and works himself into an ultimate-high-frenzy, battling on the disco floor of a nightclub for short-lived glory. After his opponent is unjustly awarded the gold medal, Starsky pulls out his gun and from there on the entire situation escalates into one of those scenes that -- like parts of Stiller's "There's Something About Mary" -- last on in viewers' minds even after the film itself fades away. The sort of sequence you might chuckle about to yourself as you drive home and recall certain moments from the film.

Stiller and Wilson -- presently two of Hollywood's most famous odd couples who have united together for a number of projects over the years -- are always likable in their films and nothing changes here. Wilson uses his sarcastic quips to an advantage, coming across as the smoother of the two, whereas Starsky is the bumbling and self-conscious idiot who is both over-protective and over-zealous.

The movie is at its best when it is cleverly satirizing the genre. Most of these films always include a sequence where the police captain will suspend the movie's protagonist and frown on him, saying something cheesy like, "Your father, who spent years on the force and was one of the highest-decorated officers, would be ashamed of you!" Instead, the police captain tells Starsky that his mother would be ashamed of him. And then after being suspended, Starsky takes a visit to his mother's grave and places a glazed donut on the headstone (she was the highly decorated cop in the family, apparently).

The film was directed by Todd Phillips, whose resume includes such raunchy efforts at comedy as the crude-but-enjoyable "Road Trip" and surprising "Old School." The latter film starred Ferrell and Vaughn and contained a cameo appearance by Snoop Dogg (as himself), so obviously these guys enjoyed working with Phillips and, I'm sure, agreed to contribute to this movie just for the heck of it.

The result is a very goofy, entertaining summer flick that never tries too hard and invariably never falls too hard, either. It does fall sometimes, but even then it usually takes its screw-ups with a pinch of salt. This is the sort of movie worth the price of admission -- just to sit back, forget your worries, and watch a couple of clowns bumble their way through an enjoyable farce of the '70s. It's not the kind of movie you'll be talking about after you see it -- just a simple popcorn flick. If you're out and about and you happen to stumble into a theater showing this film, you'll find your money well spent. I won't praise "Starsky and Hutch" for being a brilliant tongue-in-cheek spoof of the cop-buddy films -- I'll merely say that, for what it is, "Starsky and Hutch" is well-made and funny -- a surprisingly simple movie that is everything it pretends to be. The majority of films that use this approach suffer because they fall victim to their targets, especially most released this year, but where the others have failed "Starsky and Hutch" succeeds.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":143120,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2005-04-06","keywords":"character names as title,buddy movie,night club,1970s,russian roulette","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Starsky & Hutch","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi25887001","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Q2NjI1OTYtMDJiNy00MDY2LWE0Y2EtY2E5ZDI2NTZjODU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2Q2NjI1OTYtMDJiNy00MDY2LWE0Y2EtY2E5ZDI2NTZjODU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Miramax","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001774/","name":"Ben Stiller","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004879/","name":"Snoop Dogg"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0680846/","name":"Todd Phillips"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0175068/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0088479/","name":"William Blinn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1192866/","name":"Stevie Long","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1016088/","name":"John O'Brien"],"duration":"PT1H41M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life
Lara Croft Tomb Raider: Kolijevka života
programme.desc:
Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life: Directed by Jan de Bont. With Angelina Jolie, Gerard Butler, Ciarán Hinds, Chris Barrie. Adventurer Lara Croft goes on a quest to save the mythical Pandora's Box, before an evil scientist finds it, and recruits a former Marine turned mercenary to assist her." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0325703/","name":"Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzYxOTgxYjAtNGI3MS00NDJkLTkyZWItZGM5MzRhOGYwYjlmL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Adventurer Lara Croft goes on a quest to save the mythical Pandora's Box, before an evil scientist finds it, and recruits a former Marine turned mercenary to assist her.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0325703/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"johnnysugar"},"dateCreated":"2003-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Best James Bond Film In Five Years!","reviewBody":"Let's face it, the James Bond franchise has become rather limp lately. "The World Is Not Enough" was a debacle of miscasting and an an endless parade of meaningless subplots and tertiary characters. "Die Another Day" suffered from much of the same, but was also saddled with an inexplicable amount of stereo feedback and one of the oddest (if catchiest) theme songs in recent memory. The series has been re-energized with the new entry "The Cradle Of Life," a high-spirited, far-reaching film that doesn't quite succeed but is such an improvement on the originals that you're ready to overlook all that.

Actually, this is a review of "Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle Of Life", the sequel to 2001's abysmally dull video-game-based film "Tomb Raider." Angelina Jolie is back as sexy, gun-toting archeologist Lara Croft, and at first glance, it's easy to mistake her for Bond, Jane Bond. Lara is a British citizen of refined taste, highly competent in various forms of weaponry, travels around the globe to exotic locations, has friends (and lovers) in virtually every port, uses a wide variety of nifty gadgets, has an amusing yet dry form of wit, looks fabulous, and routinely saves the world from a madman bent on global domination. She's a better 007 than Timothy Dalton in any case.

The film begins with Lara diving into a sunken temple off the coast of Greece. While there, she is attacked by Chinese mercenaries, her support crew killed and left for dead, the mercenaries making off with a mysterious glowing orb. Seems that mad scientist Jonathan Reiss (Ciaran Hinds) is looking for Pandora's Box, and the orb is the key to finding it. Lara is appointed by MI:6 with stopping Reiss because opening the box would unleash an amazingly nasty plague upon the world. Besides her support staff of Hillary (Chris Barrie) and computer expert Bryce (Noah Taylor), Lara joins forces with ex-lover Terry Sheridan (Gerard Butler), a shifty mercenary and the only person who knows how to get to the mercenaries who stole the orb in the first place. And of course, time is running out.

Jolie is excellent as Lara Croft, and there probably isn't an actress around who would be better cast in the role. Jolie has the physicality, the look, the voice, and the attitude to pull off the role effortlessly. She was the only redeeming factor in the first film, and she's great to watch here. The supporting cast is a mixed bag. Hinds refrains from chewing up too much of the scenery, but he brings to mind some of the more notable Bond villains of recent times. Butler is great to look at, but his performance is far too low-key and deadpan for a movie as bombastic as this one wants to be, especially when he's paired with Jolie, who enters each seen with a relishing look in her eyes. Taylor again acts as a dry kind of comic relief, and he displays far more chemistry with Jolie than Butler does.

One of the biggest improvements in this film is the director. Replacing Simon West (responsible for the monotonous "Con Air") is Jan de Bont ("Speed"), a much more competent director even if some of his films are only barley entertaining ("The Haunting"). de Bont has a knack for action on a small scale, most vividly in a gun-fight staged in a laboratory/office, but his large scale pieces, like Lara body-gliding off of one of Hong Kong's tallest buildings, lack drama. Still, de Bont has chosen good locations and sets for the film, and there is a blessedly welcome lack of the "Matrix"-style visuals and candy-colored bombast so popular in action films of recent memory. He is nothing if not up to task. The film operates well within its own set of rules and physics, unlike many other films that tend to sacrifice internal logic for cheap stunts.

As much of an improvement on the first film as this is, there are still flaws. The script, while improving ten-fold on the original, still falls flat on several occasions, sometimes held up only by Jolie's confident line readings. At almost two hours, the film displays a desperate need for tighter scenes and a quicker pace while simultaneously leaving some scenes cut too quickly. The movie can be very easily divided into stages, which may hold true to the spirit of the video game's levels, but often leaves the audience doing nothing more than predicting when the DVD chapter cuts will occur in six months. Also, like the James Bond films, there is rarely any doubt that Lara will escape any dire situation she finds herself in. Like 007, we always know the hero will prevail in the end, which robs some scenes of the tension needed to excite the audience.

Despite some of these flaws, "The Cradle Of Life" is a fine movie and a good way to spend 2 hours on a summer afternoon. Jolie obviously enjoys the role, and if nothing else, the film is worth it for that alone. Here's hoping the third entry into the series is even better than the this one. 7 out of 10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":135160,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2003-09-24","keywords":"archeologist,based on video game,sequel,altered version of studio logo,eight word title","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Lara Croft Tomb Raider Two: The Cradle of Life","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi143786265","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDg5YWJlNjMtNzNjNC00YjZmLWEwMDQtNDBhMmZjYWRmMjBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDg5YWJlNjMtNzNjNC00YjZmLWEwMDQtNDBhMmZjYWRmMjBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Paramount Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124930/","name":"Gerard Butler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0057368/","name":"Chris Barrie"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000957/","name":"Jan de Bont"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007500/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1212988/","name":"Dean Georgaris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0211823/","name":"Steven E. de Souza"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0366337/","name":"James V. Hart"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
Bili smo vojnici
programme.desc: We Were Soldiers: Directed by Randall Wallace. With Mel Gibson, Madeleine Stowe, Greg Kinnear, Sam Elliott. The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War, and the soldiers on both sides that fought it, while their wives wait nervously and anxiously at home for the good news or the bad news." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0277434/","name":"We Were Soldiers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTk3NTc4MTktNjFmZC00ZjdjLWE0ZjgtNTM4NzdmMDBjOTcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDkzNTM2ODg@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War, and the soldiers on both sides that fought it, while their wives wait nervously and anxiously at home for the good news or the bad news.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0277434/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ggraziano"},"dateCreated":"2003-06-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Mixed feelings","reviewBody":"We Were Soldiers is not for the squeamish. It ranks up there with Saving Private Ryan for realistically showing the brutality of war. I was moved almost beyond description by the ordeal these 390-odd US Army Air Cav soldiers endured at the hands of thousands of Viet Cong troops. It is as close to Hell as one could get on earth--a charnel house of horrors, where death is sudden and swift. Mel Gibson and Sam Elliot lead a group of green recruits into the Valley Of Death on an impossible mission in the early days of our involvement in Vietnam.\n\nBased on actual events in 1965, this was the first major involvement of US troops and North Vietnamese regulars. The writing, directing, and acting are first rate, and the battle scenes are too real for comfort. What really makes the mind reel is that after the slaughter depicted in this film, Mel's character Lt. Col. Hal Moore goes back to the valley of death for more than 200 days. The American dead are listed on 3 East of the Vietnam Memorial Wall. I stood at attention and cried when the names of the fallen were listed at the end of the film. You will, too."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":135635,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2002-04-24","keywords":"battle,soldier,vietnam war,helicopter,based on true story","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"We Were Soldiers","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi451019033","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzY1OWMzYWItNDllMS00NTQ2LWI0YzMtY2FmZWFmMjlmZmUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzY1OWMzYWItNDllMS00NTQ2LWI0YzMtY2FmZWFmMjlmZmUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Paramount Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000154/","name":"Mel Gibson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000656/","name":"Madeleine Stowe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001427/","name":"Greg Kinnear"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0908824/","name":"Randall Wallace"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000700/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0089335/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1051840/","name":"Harold G. programme.title: Operacioni i shpëtimit
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Dolph Lundgren. Oficeri i infiltruar Uillër burgoset në një nëndetëse nga agjentët e CIA-s. Ata do bëjnë çmos për t'i nxjerrë informacionet që kanë nevojë, por nuk janë të pergatitur për pasojat.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Mbretër të rrugës II
programme.desc: Ray Liotta, Clifton Powell. Në rrugët e dhunshme të Detroitit, dikush po vret një e nga një oficerët e policisë dhe dy hetues do të futen në një botë të rrezikshme korrupsioni për të zbuluar të vërtetën...
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: Dredd
programme.desc: 2012. Një riprodhim i filmit kult të vitit 1995. Në një të ardhme ku një polic ka të drejtën të jetë gjykatës, juri dhe ekzekutues, ai dhe ndihmësja e tij nuk ndalen para asgjëje për të shkatërruar perandorinë e krimit të një gruaje.
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Punë ekstreme
programme.desc: 2019. Një grup detektivësh të dështuar infiltrohen si punonjës në një restorant për të mbërthyer një bandë kriminale. Por, situata kthen papritmas kur gatimi i tyre e transformon restorantin e dështuar në një prej vendeve më të pëlqyera në qytet.
programme.category: Kinemaja Aziatike

programme.title: Sfiduesi
programme.desc: Kur vihet në kurth për vrasjen e Udhëheqësit Sovran të Botës së Re, një ushtar i ri duhet të zgjedhë nëse do të vazhdojë t'i qëndrojë besnik ideologjisë së pushtetit, apo t'i bashkohet grupit të sfiduesve.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Mbreti Akrep: Libri i shpirtrave
programme.desc: 2018. Mbreti Akrep bashkon forcat me nje luftëtare të quajtur Tala. Sëbashku ata do të kërkojnë një relike legjendare të njohur si 'Libri i shpirtrave', i cili u nevojtitet për te mposhtur një kryekomandant të lig.
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Qyteti i policëve
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone, Harvey Keitel, Robert De Niro. Në një qytet në dukje të qetë, të populluar nga policët, një sherif përballet me një komplot në radhët e tyre dhe duhet të zgjedhë mes zbatimit të ligjit dhe mbrojtjes së idhujve të tij.
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: Rrëmbim në Venecia
programme.desc: 2017. Bruce Willis, John Goodman, Jason Momoa. Për të shpëtuar qenin e tij të dashur nga banda e pamëshirshme që e rrëmbeu, një detektiv i lodhur privat duhet të shkelë pak ligjin për llogari të kreut të bandës...
programme.category: Aksion
komedi

programme.title: E shkuar e errët
programme.desc: Zara dhe Brajani bëjnë jetën e përkryer në një qytet të vogël, deri kur Zara shmang heroikisht një grabitje dhe bëhet lajm kryesor. Fama e padëshiruar rizgjon të kaluarën e saj misteroze dhe tani githçka që ajo ka të shtrenjtë është në rrezik.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Eksodi: Perëndi dhe Mbretëresha
programme.desc: 2014. Christian Bale. Regjisor Ridley Scott. Mojsiu, njeriut që guxoi t'i kundërvihej një mbretërie, sakrifikoi gjithçka dhe ndërmorri një udhëtim të jashtëzakonshëm për të larguar 600 mijë skllevër nga tirania e faraonit Ramses...
programme.category: Epik
fantazi

programme.title: Në rrezik për jetën 2
programme.desc: Michael Jai White. Gjatë një ndeshje basketbolli, që ndiqet nga mijëra spektatorë, një roje sigurie, ish ekspert i forcave speciale, zbulon sulmin e planifikuar nga një grup terroristësh. Tani, përballja e vërtetë zhvillohet jashtë fushe...
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Plan arratie 3
programme.desc: 2019. Sylvester Stallone, Dave Bautista. Pasi eksperti i sigurisë Ray Breslin punësohet për të shpëtuar një vajzë të rrëmbyer nga një burg të frikshëm Letonez, e dashura e tij gjithashtu merret peng. Tani, armiqtë e tij janë më në rrezik se kurrë...
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Mision i pamundur 4: Protokolli fantazme
programme.desc: T.Cruise, J. Renner. Ethan Hunt dhe skuadra e tij akuzohen si terroristë... Ne përpjekje për të mbrojtur emrin e tyre, ata zbulojnë një plan të tmerrshëm për një luftë nukleare. Tani janë pikërisht ata që duhet të shpëtojnë botën...
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë
thriller

programme.title: Agimi i kuq
programme.desc: 2012. Chris Hemsworth. Banorët e nje qyteze, zgjohen të tmerruar nga shpërthimet dhe ushtarë koreano veriorë, që po zbresin me parashutë. Një grup të rinjsh, të drejtuar nga një ish marins, fillojnë një mision për të shpëtuar qytezën e tyre...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Tombstone
programme.desc: Kurt Russell, Val Kilmer. Thonë që çdo qytet ka një legjendë. Historia e Wyatt Earp, ligjvënësit më të famshem të Perendimit të Eger.
programme.category: Një duel western

programme.title: I vetmi
programme.desc: Jet Li, Carla Gugino, Delroy Lindo, Jason Statham. Jet Li në rolin e dyfishtë si një oficer policie në luftë për jetën e tij kundër një vrasësi sozi nga një univers tjetër.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Udhëtim drejt Perëndimit
programme.desc: 2015. Kodi Smit-McPhee, Michael Fassbender. Ndërkohë që kërkon për të dashurën e tij në perëndimin e egër të viteve 1800, një 16 vjeçar skocez, shoqërohet nga një njeri misteroz, i cili i mban të fshehura motivet e tij të vërteta...
programme.category: Western

programme.title: Rebelët
programme.desc: Pasi vrasin një ushtar në Britaninë e pushtuar Roma, katër adoleshentë rebelë duhet të mësojnë të bashkëjetojnë në arrati, ose do të përballen me zemërimin e Romës dhe vdekjen të sigurt.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë

programme.title: Swat
programme.desc: Collin Farell. Kriminelet e te gjithe Amerikes do te benin çdo gje per te nxjerre nga burgu Bosin e droges Alex Montel per nje shperblim prej 100 milione $.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: 6 mënyra për të vdekur
programme.desc: Vinnie Jones, Vivica A. Fox, Michael Rene Walton. Një njeri misterioz, ka si mision kryesor që ta bëjë shpërndarësin më të madh të drogës në Amerikë të pësojë 6 humbje të mëdha, përpara se ta vrasë.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Kokëkrisuri
programme.desc: Ben Affleck, Jennifer Garner, Colin Farrell. Një njeri i verbuar nga mbetje toksike të cilat shtuan dhe ndjeshmërië e shqisave të tij, lufton krimin si një superhero akrobatik i arteve marciale.
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Rrëmbim në Meksikë
programme.desc: Scott Adkins. Një ish-ushtar i Forcave Speciale lë pas karrierën e dhunshme për të ndërtuar një jetë të re me të birin në bregdetin Meksikan. Pasi shtëpia e tij sulmohet dhe i biri rrëmbehet, ai fillon misionin e jetës së tij.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Vrasësi i tatuazheve
programme.desc: Një krim i kryer në kufi të provincës Quebec dhe Ontario do te sjellë së bashku dy policë me stile pune, qëndrime dhe gjuhë të ndryshme, por që do të bashkojnë forcat për të zbuluar atë që media e ka mbiquajtur 'Vrasësi i tatuazheve'.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Shpejtësi dhe çmenduri 6
programme.desc: Paul Walker, Vin Diesel. Hobs, bind Domin dhe Brajanin, që të mbledhin edhe një herë të fundit skuadrën, për të vënë para drejtësisë nje kriminel që po drejton pilotë makinash për të kryer grabitje të ndryshme...
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: Plan i blinduar
programme.desc: Columbus Short, Matt Dillon, Laurence Fishburne. Një ekip rojesh kamionësh te blinduar që transportojnë para, tentojnë të vjedhin kompaninë ku punojnë. Por shumë shpejt plani i tyre në dukje i pagabueshëm merr një kthesë vdekjeprurëse.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.desc: John Cusack, Amanda Peet. Më 21.12.2012, ngjarje apokaliptike do shkatërrojnë botën dhe do të rrezikojnë ekzistencën e njerëzimit. Kjo është përpjekja e një grupi të mbijetuarish, që kërkojnë të gjejnë zgjidhje para se të jetë vonë.
programme.category: Fantashkence

programme.title: Vatha e qenve
programme.desc: Në një instutucion rehabilitimi për të rinjtë, tre adoleshentë përpiqen të qëndrojnë jashtë teleasheve ndërsa përballen me të burgosur të dhunshëm dhe të rritur abuzivë.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Vetmitari
programme.desc: Michael Douglas, Susan Sarandon. Danny De Vito. Kjo është historia e Ben Kalmen. Ai ka një familje perfekte dhe një karrierë të shkëlqyer. Por kjo nuk është një histori suksesi, por çfarë vjen pas tij...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Njerka
programme.desc: Julia Roberts, Susan Sarandon. Drama prekëse e dy grave, njëra nënë e dy fëmijëve dhe tjetra njerka e tyre. Një marrdhënie e trazuar, që ndryshon vetëm kur njëra prej tyre merr lajmin se është sëmurë rëndë.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Parajsa pa shenjtorë
programme.desc: Casey Affleck, Rooney Mara. Një njeri merr përsipër fajin për krimin e kryer nga bashkëshortja dhe pasi arratiset nga burgu pas 4 vitesh vihet në kërkim të saj dhe të vajzës së tij të vogël, që nuk e ka takuar kurrë.
programme.category: Romancë
krim

programme.title: Greta
programme.desc: Një adoleshente e trazuar dhe rebele (Hilary Duff), dërgohet për të kaluar verën me gjyshërit e saj. Një verë e mbushur plot ngjarje që do t'i ndryshojnë përgjithmonë jetën.
programme.category: Portret familjar

programme.title: Merr dhe lër
programme.desc: Jennifer Garner.Pas vdekjes së papritur të të fejuarit, një vajzë e re gjen prehje në shoqërinë e miqve të tij. Por pas zbulimit të disa të fshehtave rreth të fejuarit, ajo kupton se ai ishte një burrë shumë ndryshe nga ç'kishte menduar.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Frontera
programme.desc: Ed Harris, Michael Peña. Gruaja e një ish-sherifi vdes aksidentalisht në një fermë në kufirin mes Amerikës dhe Meksikës dhe faji bie një një emigrant ilegal. Por ndërkohë që hetimet vazhdojnë, jetët e shumë njerëve ndyrshojnë përgjithmonë.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Zemër e vrarë
programme.desc: Jessica Biel. Mei, një instruktore joge, e gjen veten të sillet në mënyra që kurrë nuk do të kishte imagjinuar për të mbrojtur motrën biologjike që sapo e ka takuar, nga i dashuri i saj i dhunshëm.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Zonja e erëzave
programme.desc: Aishwarya Rai. Tilo është mjeshtre e erëzave dhe hap një dyqan në San Francisko. Ajo arrin të lexojë jetën dhe deshirat e klienteve të saj dhe u jep atyre erëza të ndryshme për t'i ndihmuar që të realizoje dëshirat e tyre.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Vitet rebele
programme.desc: Liv Tyler, Joaquin Phoenix. Dy vëllezër të pashëm të klasës punëtore afrohen me vajzat e familjes më të pasur të qytetit. Ndërsa ndjenjat mes tyre forcohen, dallimet klasore dhe dramat familjare kërcënojnë dashuritë dhe jetët e të rinjve.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Tesla
programme.desc: 2020. Ethan Hawke. Shpikësi brilliant, vizionar, Nikola Tesla në luftën e tij të ashpër për të realizuar sistemin e tij revolucionar elektrik. Marrëdhënia me rivalin Tomas Edison, me përkrahësit e tij dhe takimi fatal me Anën.
programme.category: Biografi
dramë

programme.title: Ditëlindja
programme.desc: Jeta e një punonjësi banke rreth të tridhjetave në qytetin e vogel te St Albans shkatërrohet nga mberritja e nuses se tij ruse, te cilen ai e kishte njohur ne internet.
programme.category: Nicole Kidman

programme.title: Mbaje frymën
programme.desc: Simon Baker. Bazuar në bestsellerin ndërkombetar të Tim Winton. Australi, mesi i viteve '70. Dy adoleshentë lidhin shoqëri me një sërfist enigmatik në moshë të mesme, i cili i nxit të provojnë emocionin e përballjes me frikërat e tyre.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Una
programme.desc: Rooney Mara. Një grua e re gjurmon vendin e punës të një burri më të madh në moshë për t'i kërkuar të vërtetën e marrëdhëniës që patën me njëri - tjetrin. Ajo ishte vetëm 13 vjeç ndërsa ai, fqinji dhe miku i besuar i të atit.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Në dashuri me time shoqe
programme.desc: Shah Rukh Khan, Anushka Sharma. Fitues i 3 çmimeve kinematografike dhe kandidat për 7 të tjerë. I martuar me një grua, e cila nuk e dashuron, një bashkëshort i ri vendos të shndërrohet në një tjetër njeri për të fituar zemrën e saj.
programme.category: Një histori Indie

programme.title: Familja Hollar
programme.desc: 2016.Një artist që mezi po ia del në Nju Jork dhe është në pritje të fëmijës së tij të parë, detyrohet të kthehet në shtëpi për nënën e tij të sëmurë dhe të përballet me familjen e tij aspak të zakontë...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Forcat e natyrës
programme.desc: Sandra Bullock, Ben Affleck. Ben Holms përgatitet për martese. Gjatë udhëtimit për atje, një incident në avion bën që të njihet me Saren. Këtu nis dilema. Një histori mbi rrugën që ndjekim dhe zgjdhjet që bëjmë gjatë saj.
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Zemra me flatra
programme.desc: J. Dornan. Një biznesmen ambicioz nga Nju Jorku shkon në Belgjikë për të mbyllur një marrëveshje të rëndësishme. Pasi bie në dashuri me një nga personat që dëmtohen nga qëllimi i tij, ai nis të ndyshojë metodat e tij të pamëshirshme të punës.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Perandori
programme.desc: Matthew Fox, Tommy Lee Jones. Menjëherë pas kapitullimit të perandorisë Japoneze në Luftën e Dytë Botërore, gjenerali Fellers, duhet të vendosë nëse perandori Japonez Hirohito, duhet të ndëshkohet apo shpëtohet...
programme.category: Dramë
luftë

programme.title: Sakrifiko ushtarin
programme.desc: 2014. Tobey Maguire, Liev Schreiber. Bazuar në një histori të vërtetë. Gjatë kulmit të Luftës së Ftohtë, gjeniu amerikan i shahut Bobby Fischer, e gjen veten mes 2 superfuqive, kur ai sfidon kampionin e Bashkimit Sovjetik...
programme.category: Biografi
dramë

programme.title: Vajza që shpiku puthjen
programme.desc: Një vajzë misterioze dhe joshëse zbret nga autobusi dhe hyn në lokalin e dy vëllezërve në moshë të mesme. E reja pa emër trondit shpejt ekuilibrat delikatë të jetës së të dyve, duke sjellë telashe dhe ndryshime në botën dhe qytetin e tyre të dorëzuar.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Vegimet e mesnatës
programme.desc: Një njeri (Michael Shannon) përpiqet t'i shmanget qeverisë dhe një grupi fetar ekstremist, ndërkohë që kërkon të zbulojë të vërtetën e fuqive mbinatyrore të të birit (Jaeden Lieberher).
programme.category: Fantashkencë
dramë
aventurë

programme.title: Miq Armiq
programme.desc: Matthias Schoenaerts. Driss dhe Manuel u rritën si vëllezër, por ndoqën drejtime të kundërta në jetë: Manueli u bë kriminel, ndërsa Driss, polic. Kur dy burrat ritakohen, kuptojnë se kanë nevojë për njëri-tjetrin për të mbijetuar në botët e tyre.
programme.category: Dramë
thriller

programme.title: 47 metra nën det: Të pambrojtu
programme.desc: 2019. Katër vajza adoleshente që zhyten në një qytet të lashtë të përmbytur, mësojnë shpejt se kanë hyrë në territorin e specieve më vdekjeprurëse të peshkaqenëve, ndërsa notojnë në larbirintet klaustrofobike të shpellave nënujore.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Zonjat me të zeza
programme.desc: Julia Ormond. Në verën e vitit 1959, nën sfondin e ndryshimeve kulturore të Australisë, një vajzë e turpshme nis një punë verore në një dyqan prestigjoz. Atje ajo takohet me 'Zonjat me të zeza', të cilat do t'ia ndryshojnë jetën përgjithmonë.
programme.category: Dramë
komedi

programme.title: Ora e ligjit
programme.desc: Ficarra dhe Picone. Në një qytezë pranë Sicilisë, Kryetari i ri i Bashkisë, ka vendosur të zhdukë zakonet e këqija, duke ndryshuar gjithçka që është në kundërshtim me ligjin. Por banorët, ky fakt nuk I gëzon aspak.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Si të bëhesh Latin Lover
programme.desc: Salma Hayek. Kur gruaja 80-vjeçare e lë për një djalë më të ri, një burrë që ka bërë karrierë duke joshur gratë e pasura, detyrohet të jetojë me të motrën. Ajo dhe nipi i saj 10-vjeçar do t'i mësojnë vlerat e vërteta të familjes.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Xhumanxhi: Mirë se erdhët në xhungel
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson, Jack Black. Në aventurën më të re 'Xhumanxhi', katër adoleshentë e gjejnë veten brenda një video loje në xhungël dhe e vetmja mënyrë për të shpëtuar është të përfundojnë lojën e rrezikshme.
programme.category: Aventurë
komedi

programme.title: Amaneti
programme.desc: Bruce Willis. Paul Kersey është një kirurg i cili ndërgjëgjësohet për dhunën në qytetin e tij, vetëm kur gruaja dhe vajza e tij sulmohen në shtëpine e tyre. Me policinë të mbingarkuar nga krimet, ai nis të vendosë vetë drejtësi.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Rrjeti i Grerëzave
programme.desc: Penélope Cruz, Edgar Ramírez, Gael García Bernal. Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. Havana, Dhjetor 1990. René González, një pilot kubanez, arratiset nga vendi drejt Miamit, me qëllimin për të shkatërruar regjimin brutal të Kastros. Por përpjekjet e tij do të.
programme.category: Drama
Thriller
Krim

programme.title: Jashtë perimetrit
programme.desc: Viti 2036. Pasi nuk iu bind urdhrave, piloti i dronëve, togeri Thomas Harp, caktohet me detyrë në një zonë luftarake vdekjeprurëse në Evropën Lindore, në mënyrë që të përjetojë luftimin në vijë të parë.
programme.category: Aksion
Adventurë
Fantazi

programme.title: Piratët e Karaibeve 5: Të vdekurit
programme.desc: Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush. Në aventurën më të fundit, kapiteni Xhek Sparou ndiqet në çdo cep të detit nga rivali i tij i hershëm kapiten Salazari dhe ekuipazhi i tij i të vdekurve, që janë të vendosur të vrasin çdo pirat... dhe sidomos Xhekun.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë
fantazi

programme.title: Askushi
programme.desc: Pasi dështon që të mbrojë familjen gjatë një grabitjeje, një baba i cili fsheh një të kaluar të dhunshme, zgjon aftësitë e vjetra dhe hakmerret për familjen e tij, duke vënë nderin në vend një herë e përgjithmonë.
programme.category: Aksion
Krim
Thriller

programme.title: Operacioni Deti i Kuq
programme.desc: Kur një komplot terrorist për të përvetësuar armë nukleare fshihet pas një grushti të dhunshëm shteti, vetëm ekipi i marinës kineze 'Jiaolong' ka aftësitë vdekjeprurëse dhe saktësinë e nevojshme për të marrë në dorë situatën.
programme.category: Aksion
luftë

programme.title: Drejtësi brutale
programme.desc: Mel Gibson, Vince Vaughn. Pasi dy policë të zellshëm, por të dhunshëm pezullohen nga puna, detyrohen të zhyten në botën e krimit për të marrë shpërblimin që mendonin se meritonin.
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Pas Cak
programme.desc: Ndiqni prapa skenave te xhirimeve te filmit.
programme.category: Shooter

programme.title: Deadwood: Filmi
programme.desc: Ian McShane. Bazuar në serialin me të njejtin titull, fitues i çmimeve 'Emmy'. Në një epokë plaçkitjeje dhe lakmie, 'Ethet e arit' joshin një turmë kërkuesish në një marrëveshje të jashtëligjshme, ku gjithçka dhe gjithkush e ka një çmim ...
programme.category: Uestern

programme.title: Shtëpia e babait
programme.desc: Kur babi i tyre, zgjohet pas 5 vjetsh nga koma, të tronditur, 4 fëmijët e tij, nuk gjejnë dot mënyrën për ti thënë, se e kanë lënë pa shtëpi. Një komedi për të mos u humbur.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Zhdukja e Sidni Hollit
programme.desc: Logan Lerman. Pas famës së papritur falë romanit të tij, bazuar në vdekjën e një prej shokëve të gjimnazit, shkrimtari Sidni Holl zhduket. Një dekadë më vonë, një detektiv nis ta kërkojë, sepse librat e tij lidhen me një varg zjarrvëniesh...
programme.category: Dramë
Mister

programme.title: Luftë baballarësh 2
programme.desc: Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg. Tani që më në fund u mësuan me njëri-tjetrin, babai biologjik Dasti dhe ai birësues Bredi, duhet të përballen me babain e secilit që vijnë për vizitë dhe kthejnë përmbys jetët e tyre.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Logan
programme.desc: 2017. Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart. Në të ardhmen e afërt, Logan i lodhur nga vite luftimesh e arratie, kujdeset për profesorin X në fshehtësi. Por bota e tyre kthehet përmbys kur një vajzë e re mutante kërkon ndihmën e tyre për të mbijetuar.
programme.category: Aksion
dramë
fantashkencë

programme.title: Ekstrakti
programme.desc: Jason Bateman, Mila Kunis, Kristen Wiig. Pas një aksidenti të pazakontë në punë, pronari i një fabrike ekstraktesh bimore përballet me një mal problemesh si në jetën personale ashtu edhe në atë profesionale...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow
programme.desc: Rob Shneider. Nje shoqërues femrash me pagese, do t'i kërkoje Djus Bigellou që të kujdeset për shtëpine dhe peshkun e tij, por eksperienca do të rezultoje një katastrofe, dhe për Djus do të nisë karriera e dashnorit me pagese.
programme.category: Dashnori me pagesë

programme.title: Mr. Bean te berberi
programme.desc: Rowan Atkinson, në rolin e tij më të pëlqyer nga publiku. Jeta për Mr. Bean, është një sfidë dhe kudo ku ai shkon gjithçka kthehet përmbys. E megjithë këto, falë këmbënguljes së tij, ai gjithmonë gjen një zgjidhje...
programme.category: Serial komik

programme.title: Mr. Bean, natën e mirë
programme.desc: Rowan Atkinson, në rolin e tij më të pëlqyer nga publiku. Jeta për Mr. Bean, është një sfidë dhe kudo ku ai shkon gjithçka kthehet përmbys. E megjithë këto, falë këmbënguljes së tij, ai gjithmonë gjen një zgjidhje...
programme.category: Serial komik

programme.title: Shkolla e Shën Trinianit
programme.desc: R.Everett. Shën Triniani, shkolla e famshme për anarkinë dhe vajzat e saj të pakontrollueshme do të mbyllet. Por, vajzat s'janë dakort me këtë perspektivë të zymtë. Ato kanë një plan: të grabisin pikturën e famshme Vajza me vëth perle.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Një polic në Beverly Hills
programme.desc: E. Murphy ne rolin e nje polici nga Detroid me pushime ne Beverly Hills. Misioni Sekret: Te hetoje mbi vrasjen e mikut te tij me te mire. Do te shkaktoje konflikte te pazakonta me menyrat e tij teper origjinale te te venit ne vend te drejtesise.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Familja
programme.desc: Kate McKinnon. Karrieristja Kejti ngarkohet të kujdeset për mbesën e saj të çuditshme, Medin. Kur ajo largohet nga shtëpia, Kejti duhet të përballet me problemet e saj të socilaizimit në mënyrë që të ndihmojë mbesen e saj të kthehet në shtëpi.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Ish e dashura ime
programme.desc: 2006. U.Thurman, L.Wilson. Matt Saunders-i, fort i ngathët me femrat, takon Jenny Johnson-in, bukuroshen që s'ka asgjë të përbashkët me vajzat që ai ka njohur deri tani. Ai ndjehet burri më me fat i botës, por kjo s'do të vazhdoje gjate.
programme.category: Komedi
romancë

programme.title: Nga hajdut në polic
programme.desc: Martin Lawrence, Luke Wilson. Një hajdut profesionist, rikthehet në një ndërtesë ku kishte fshehur një diamant të vlefshëm. Por ndërtesa është një rajon policie dhe për të rimarrë 'atë që i takon' ai duhet të futet në radhët e tyre...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Pole të kundërta
programme.desc: Sarah Felberbaum, Luca Argentero. Ajo është avokate divorcesh, ai terapist çiftesh. Dashuria nuk është në mendjen e asnjërit, por nje takim i rastësishëm dhe e paimagjinueshmja nuk mund të shmanget...
programme.category: Komedi
romancë

programme.title: SHUBSH
programme.desc: 2015. M.Whitman, R.Amell. Pasi zbulon se disa vajza i kanë vënë nofkën 'SHUBSH' (Shoqja Ultra Bullare Shëmtake), një adoleshente e ndihmuar dhe nga djali më popullor i shkollës, bën të pamundurën për të ndryshuar reputacionin e pamerituar .
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: 10 gjërat që urrej tek ty
programme.desc: Julia Stiles, Heath Ledget. Një djalë dhe një vajzë që konsiderohen nga shoqëria si të çuditshëm bien në dashuri me njëri-tjetrin për shkak të një basti.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Zohan: Liçensë për të krehur
programme.desc: Adam Sandler, John Turturro, Emmanuelle Chriqui. Pas vdekjes së tij të rreme, agjenti izraelit i forcave speciale Zohan, shkon në New York për të filluar një jetë të re si parukier. Parukier me metodat më të pazakonta që keni parë ndonjëherë.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Bebe surprizë
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2009. Heather Graham, Jerry O'Connell. Një çift i lumtur me një të ardhme të ndritur zbulon se do të kenë një fëmijë, duke filluar kështu një aventurë nëntë mujore të pabesueshme.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Përgjithmonë shoqëruesja e nuses
programme.desc: Gjatë gjithë jetës së saj, Korina ka shoqëruar të gjitha vajzat që njeh drejt altarit. E lodhur duke qënë shoqëruese nderi e çdo nuseje, ajo merr guximin t'i kthehet botës së vështirë të takimeve.
programme.category: Komedi
romancë

programme.title: Mes botësh
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage. Një burrë i rrënuar nga vdekja e bashkëshortes dhe vajzës së tij, bashkohet në përpjekjen e dëshpëruar të një gruaje me aftësi psikike, për të shpëtuar shpirtin e humbur të vajzës së saj.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Tmerr për Hallouin
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2008. Katër histori të ndryshme, do të ndërthuren në natën e Hallouinit, për të sjellë tek ju të gjitha llojet e mundshme të frikës... Nëse nuk respektoni rregullat këtë natë, nesër mund të mos jeni gjallë...
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Rrugëtim në frikë
programme.desc: Një djalë dhe një vajzë që me makinë po përpiqen të shkojnë në një koncert muzikor, ngatërrojnë rrugën dhe fillojnë të terrorizohen nga një njeri misterioz...
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Rruga
programme.desc: Viggo Mortensen, Charlize Theron, Kodi Smit-McPhee. Në një sfond apokaliptik, kur bota është shkatërruar nga zjarre e tërmete, një baba do të nisë një udhëtim të jashtëzakonshëm për të shpëtuar të birin.
programme.category: Apokalips

programme.title: Krampusi: Ana e errët e Krisht
programme.desc: 2015. Adam Scott, Toni Collette, David Koechner. Një familje e mbledhur për Krishtlindje, por që ka humbur shpirtin e festave, do të ringjallë 'Krampusin', krijesën e frikshme, e cila hakmerret ndaj të gjithë atyre që nuk besojnë...
programme.category: Komedi
fantazi
hrror

programme.title: Në shtrat me armikun
programme.desc: Ajo është banorja më e re e një qyteti të vogël, por pas buzëqeshjes së saj fshihet një sekret, pas syve fshihet frikë. Julia Roberts që do të ndryshojë emrin, pamjen, gjithcka për t'i shpëtuar njeriut më të rrezikshëm, bashkëshortit të saj.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Droni
programme.desc: Sean Bean. Një njeri familjar punon në fshehtësi si pilot droni, duke kyer misione vdekjeprurëse nga rehatia e qytezës së tij. Kur një biznesmen pakistanez i shfaqet në derën e shtëpisë, ai detyrohet të përballë pasojat e veprimeve të tij.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Velloja e mjegullës
programme.desc: 2015. Një shkrimtar dhe drejtues televiziv i njohur kapet duke vjedhur dyqane nga një roje sigurie, i cili nuk njofton policinë, por fillon ta shantazhojë për t'u bërë miq të ngushtë.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Në shtegun e hakmarrjes
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins, Julia Stiles, Ray Liotta. Një vajzë e re, bind dy njerëz që t'i bashkohen misionit të saj për hakmarrje ndaj një ish-polici që e përndjek.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Thirrja
programme.desc: 2014. Susan Sarandon, Topher Grace. Donald Sutherland. Një hetuese në një qytet të vogël, përabllet me një vrasës serial që beson se thirret nga bota e përtejme.
programme.category: Thriller

He tries to help her on her quest, but can be an interference.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2224026/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sky_magician"},"dateCreated":"2016-01-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"pretty good","reviewBody":"The only con I have to really say about this movie is,


* All the Rihanna songs. It felt like every song on the soundtrack was one of hers. If you're a huge fan and never get tired of her, take it as a treat. Otherwise it is excessive. It'd be fine with a couple songs, and maybe one more playing on their TV or radio, but as the only music at all?



* The morals were very impressive. But somehow, in some very strange way, they felt miss-able, even though they were right there, highlighted. It may have been partly due to the movie feeling slightly detached. I'm not sure how else to put it. And... all the excessive distracting Rihanna. In important scenes I felt myself paying more attention to the fact that it was another one of her songs playing, again. Shes definitely not a bad artist, and I don't dislike her. Even if it was one of my favorite bands instead, I'd probably feel the same, hoping they play something else.


The movie had a lot of highly creative elements, which I always appreciate in an animated film. Dreamsworks does a fine job with its characterization as always, even with Tip coming out with a character trait we all saw coming (every single movie has one.) The antagonists and lessons were great, how the characters treaded the planet's 'renovation' was fun to watch. The relationships and character growth was exceptionally well done.

I'd give it a 6.5, but no decimals. It was there, yet it also wasn't? I'd still watch it again. An alien on the run from his own people makes friends with a girl. He tries to help her on her quest, but can be an interference." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2224026/","name":"Home","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExOTQ4MDMyMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTE3NDM2MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An alien on the run from his own people makes friends with a girl. He tries to help her on her quest, but can be an interference.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2224026/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"sky_magician","dateCreated":"2016-01-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"pretty good","reviewBody":"The only con I have to really say about this movie is,


* All the Rihanna songs. It felt like every song on the soundtrack was one of hers. If you're a huge fan and never get tired of her, take it as a treat. Otherwise it is excessive. It'd be fine with a couple songs, and maybe one more playing on their TV or radio, but as the only music at all?



* The morals were very impressive. But somehow, in some very strange way, they felt miss-able, even though they were right there, highlighted. It may have been partly due to the movie feeling slightly detached. I'm not sure how else to put it. And... all the excessive distracting Rihanna. In important scenes I felt myself paying more attention to the fact that it was another one of her songs playing, again. Shes definitely not a bad artist, and I don't dislike her. Even if it was one of my favorite bands instead, I'd probably feel the same, hoping they play something else.


The movie had a lot of highly creative elements, which I always appreciate in an animated film. Dreamsworks does a fine job with its characterization as always, even with Tip coming out with a character trait we all saw coming (every single movie has one.) The antagonists and lessons were great, how the characters treaded the planet's 'renovation' was fun to watch. The relationships and character growth was exceptionally well done.

I'd give it a 6.5, but no decimals. It was there, yet it also wasn't? I'd still watch it again. Just takes a little push for this movie.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":97448,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2015-03-25","keywords":"alien,human,friendship,interspecies friendship,outer space","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Feel The Light (From The Original Motion Picture Soundtrack, Home)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2222961433","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1MTExMjQzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDc1NDM5NjE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1MTExMjQzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDc1NDM5NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Music video by Jennifer Lopez performing Feel The Light (From The Original Motion Picture Soundtrack, Home).
